Tech.name: To Defend Unto Death
Tech.Description: The Empress Guard hold the honor of their duties seriously. Only the pure of soul and sharp of eye meet the Crane Clan's exacting standards. You may add half your Honor Rank to all attack and Perception rolls. Also, while defending the Imperial family, you may add +10 to your Armor TN.

Tech.name: The World in the Palm of the Hand
Tech.Description: The Asahina are the fi nest crafters of tsangusuri (fetishes) in the whole of Rokugan, and their treasures are highly prized. When using an Artisan Skill or a Craft Skill to create a small token of some kind, you may spend a Void Point to confer a one-time blessing into the token. Whoever is in possession of the token may activate this blessing at any time. When activated, the token grants a bonus of +2k0 to one High Skill Roll. No more than one token may be used per day per individual.

RequirementOption.text: One Craft or Artisan Skill at rank 3
